Package rice.pastry.leafset

Interface Summary
LeafSetProtocol  
 

Class Summary
BroadcastLeafSet Broadcast a leaf set to another node.
InitiateLeafSetMaintenance Initiate leaf set maintenance on the local node.
LeafSet A class for representing and manipulating the leaf set.
LeafSetProtocolAddress The address of the leafset protocol at a pastry node.
RequestLeafSet Request a leaf set from another node.
SimilarSet A set of nodes, ordered by numerical distance of their Id from the local Id
 

Exception Summary
LSRangeCannotBeDeterminedException
